documents.document: @MarianKeyes What a treat for New Year's Day... You O'Freshco (Oirish al fresco) in Wicklow!! xxxx
@MarianKeyes Aww the Redzers and Tedzer with Baby Hannah... That's one blissful picture for you and Himself @TonyBainz xx

@MarianKeyes Happy New Year, Marian! Was Wicklow very quiet? Need to get back into walking and hiking, but it's not a resolution. More a note to self to be kind to myself if I can't walk as much as I'd like to xxx
My @Super6: BUR 0-3 LIV, LEI 1-1 HUD, STO 2-1 NEW, LEE 1-0 NOT, QPR 1-1 CDF, WED 1-1 BRT https://t.co/28ZJtme8Mx #Super6
Happy New Year 2018 from Dublin!! No resolutions. Just to continue to be kind to myself and others. And to not stress out (yeah right).
@vinnymacnamara @MarianKeyes Yes, so hooked on Vikings!! Now @TheGNShow then more Vikings... Ok, maybe tomorrow!
@MarianKeyes Happy New Year Marian and @TonyBainz !!! We're just watching @TheGNShow and wishing each other a happy new year at midnight before bed!! See you in 2018 xxxxx
RT @PaulMcCartney: Huge congrats Sir Ringo! Sir Richard Starkey has a nice ring to it. Best drummer best pal! X Paul https://t.co/ew5PuxhE…
He'll always be #KingKenny to us @kennethdalglish #LFC #YNWA https://t.co/auVyB0jNFg

@stevemacca11 You were the reason I watched #LFC on Astro when I went home to KL from Dublin every summer. Will you be punditry-ing back in the UK? Thanks for all the logical comments on Astro, Steve!
@MarianKeyes Travelling alone is my mantra... Hope you managed to leave the duty-free in time without @TonyBainz there to drag you away
@MarianKeyes Are the paycocks turquoisey or white?
@piersmorgan @Carra23 Well @kennethdalglish is our King, has too many medals already, so a medal for a knighthood wouldn't fit on his suit... Plus he already has a stand named after him #KingKenny
@Rick_Stein Congratulations from across the Irish Sea!!
My @Super6: BOR 2-2 EVT, CHE 3-1 STO, HUD 1-1 BUR, LIV 3-0 LEI, NEW 2-1 BHA, WAT 2-1 SWA https://t.co/28ZJtme8Mx #Super6
@TonyBainz @MarianKeyes You're both pretty amazing in reality! We love you both loads xxxx
@MarianKeyes @TonyBainz That's brought a tear to my eye... Lovely sentiments for a lovely man (although he supports the Watfords, we'll forgive him on that note) xxx
@MarianKeyes Wishing both you and @TonyBainz Happy Anniversary!! You're our favourite couple! Here's to another happy 22 years ahead! xxxx
Voted for our @MarianKeyes and The Break https://t.co/bx5GE4XFxk

@MarianKeyes I was refined-sugar-free for 12 months. Then the tins of Quality St., McVitites bisquits, and After Eight called my name. As well as lemon curd cake and Lily O'Brien's choclit!! I've given myself till new year's day to slowly wean myself off sugar! I'll be eating cheese! xx
Forever our Princess #CarrieFisher #PrincessLeia #WeMissOurPrincess https://t.co/O9Qdi0B5xl
@paulmartin83 @MCATEER4 I'd go with @Phil_Thompson4 who wore the number 4 the best!! And won everything!! That was my childhood/adolescent years!
@NigelSlater Börek!!! Oh, Nigel, you're killing me, and it's past 10pm. I may have to raid the fridge! @BBCTwo
@NigelSlater The best honeycomb ever comes from Turkey. Breakfast of eggs, sucuk, olives, tomatoes, cucumber, cheese, yogurt, Turkish bread and honey... OMG bliss!! @BBCTwo
@NigelSlater OMG you got to eat pide in Trabzon!! Gorgeous! I'm so envious! @BBCTwo

@NigelSlater Just catching up with Middle East on @BBCTwo and getting really homesick for Turkey and Turkish food. We lived there from '80-'82. How things have changed since then, but I still love and crave authentic Turkish food.
@RedRockTV3 Dunne has the same look in his eyes as Rory did in the last series... guilt! #RedRock
@RedRockTV3 So good to see @denisemcactress again on #RedRock We miss you on @DWTSIRL , Denise!
@RedRockTV3 🤣🤣Aah Linda, you tease! #RedRock
@MarianKeyes "Ooh I have 1, 2, 3, 4...5 fingers!!! Foncy that!!"

Happy Monday all... a new day, a new week, after a rare weekend to recharge and rest up. Scotland beat France 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁳󠁣󠁴󠁿32 - 26🇫🇷 🏉Then Liverpool beat S'ton 2-0 ⚽️ ... Bliss!! #BloodyColdOutsideButImHappy
OMG does Brian have PMS this week?? He doesn't like anything tonight! #DWTSIrl
@RYANMCS You tell him, Ryan!!! #AnnaForTheWeek #DWTSIrl
Nasi Lemak anyone? A belated surprise for vinnymcnamara217 who celebrated his birthday last… https://t.co/bmX27ewp1K
@MarianKeyes @IrishTimesLife Will *look for* series 1 first! xxx

@MarianKeyes @IrishTimesLife Never watched Modus, should we give it a Viennese whirl? Kari is so odd but enjoyable to watch. He reminds us of DS Stone in ITV's Chasing Shadows. Quirky and odd. We finished Arctic Ganzis! xxxxx

@MarianKeyes @IrishTimesLife "Within moments, so much of my hair has stuck to my face that I’m sporting a full beard." HAHAHAHA!!! I know EXACTLY what you mean, Marian! We're watching Bordertown... Have you finished Arctic Murders? xxxx
My @Super6: EVT 2-2 PAL, STO 1-1 BHA, SWA 2-1 BUR, WHA 1-1 WAT, DER 3-1 NOR, WOL 3-0 QPR https://t.co/28ZJtme8Mx #Super6
@TonyBainz @vinnymacnamara See, Tony knows the truth!!
@vinnymacnamara @TonyBainz Nope!! They were taken last year ahem!
@TonyBainz @vinnymacnamara Something in the Irish water. Genes. Healthier lifestyle.... Malaysian cuisine? He married me!?! *runs* Hahaha!
Happy Birthday to my dear hubster @vinnymacnamara You're my rock, my love, my bestest friend. Love you now and always xxxx #HappyBirthday #HalfACentury #YoureHOWOld #Love https://t.co/FzfH4D6KgQ

@MarianKeyes We could go and take them away for you, Marian and send them here, there and everywhere, if you like. That is, if they're not already gone (I've only just been on the twitters) @vinnymacnamara
RT @Littlecoffeefx: It's time for the Brush Lettering 101 Starter Kit Giveaway! Big thanks to @TombowUSA for generously sponsoring the gran…
@RedRockTV3 So, if Tom brings down Dunne, that's not such a bad thing eh... #Karma #BringBackNikki #RedRock
@RedRockTV3 Well, Tom's been lying to Dunne... He forgot to mention that he was the FSOG fan, and not Donna! #RedRock
@RedRockTV3 ...But Angela, Dunne HAS found the guy!! #RedRock
@MarianKeyes Lived in the U.S for 7 years and never got into it. Now it's here, it's like stalking me... Can't stand it!!

@NigelSlater Our Makmur can be filled with either nuts (usually ground peanuts or dates), and is also served during the Eid, after the month of Ramadan. Can't wait for next week's episode! #NigelSlatersMiddleEast @BBCTwo

@NigelSlater Just catching up with #NigelSlatersMiddleEast on @BBCTwo and loving all the food. Having lived in Egypt (twice, I was born there), and Turkey, it's making me homesick! Ma'amoul was brought over to Malaysia by the Arabs, so we have our version, called "Makmur"
@TonyBainz @vinnymacnamara @MarianKeyes Yay *wink wink* that's the one! *puts away frisbee and boomerang*
Holy moly 😱🏉🇮🇪 #FRAvIRE
@vinnymacnamara @MarianKeyes We could drop it over and throw it over your hedge if you can't wait for Mr. Postman xxxx

@vinnymacnamara @MarianKeyes It was addictive, Marian... We just couldn't stop at one! One a week is torture. We binged on #Vikings too... Look what you've made us do Marian! #ScandinavianMadness #CanIBeAViking
@MarianKeyes @bbcstrictly They're superbly fabaliss!! If I were dancing in SuperValu, I'd be waltzing down the choclit aisle! xxx #OneTwoThreeOohChocolate
@MarianKeyes So our local #Supervalu in Knocklyon just went all Strictly today! They can give everyone on @bbcstrictly and #DWTSIrl a run for his or her money! https://t.co/JCteZcAMLT
@RYANMCS So this just happened in our local #Supervalu in Knocklyon, S. Dublin! @GregorErin has some competition!! Good luck for tomrrow! https://t.co/JCteZcAMLT
My @Super6: BOR 1-1 STO, BHA 1-1 WHA, LEI 2-0 SWA, MNU 2-0 HUD, WBA 2-1 SOU, LEE 2-2 CDF https://t.co/28ZJtme8Mx #Super6
@jamieoliver I find people who don't eat whole fish weird, so salmon belly is normal for me. All bellies, trout, snapper, the lot. But then, I'm from Malaysia. We love our fish.
RT @thepooluk: "Have you tried being happier?": things not to say to someone who is depressed from @jimsyjampots https://t.co/QXE5FpQNfF
My @Super6: CHE 1-1 BOR, EVT 2-2 LEI, NEW 1-1 BUR, MNC 2-0 WBA, STO 2-1 WAT, TOT 2-2 MNU https://t.co/28ZJtme8Mx #Super6
@MarianKeyes Aw you must be so so proud!! I wasn't confident enough to join the MUN in my American High School waaaay back in 83-84! #GoEmaGo

3 books from @caramelamac 's collection that meant lots to us both. She loved reading, a total book addict. As huge fans of @MarianKeyes it's comforting to know I have Carmel's copy to remember her by #RIPCarmel @salihughes @MCSnugz @vinnymacnamara https://t.co/AdOuikbsR3
@zandook @RedRockTV3 Mammy Brennan knows a lot more than pans and buns!
@RedRockTV3 Amazing! What a storyliine for her! She looks like she's looking at the choccie biscuits, and wondering if Paudge could bring over the spice bag instead.
@RedRockTV3 That's a scary image... Linda in a zumba class! Run, Johno, run! #RedRock
@Mary1McHale Mammy makes a better detective!
Mammy copped it! 😂😂😂 #RedRock
@RedRockTV3 Rub it in, why don'tcha.... Poor Paudge. Not quite like Sharon now, are we? But hey we love you, Paudge #RedRock
For @caramelamac https://t.co/DQxnhGBPfL
Sunday. After 16 days, we were up north to clear Carmel's house. Tough as it was, I only noticed… https://t.co/1xKNIQqNI6

Dolores, the war is over, I hope you have found peace https://t.co/ABQdUMaG0i
@sweetfa21 @martin_compston @Line_of_duty LOD is a winner in my book, anyway!! Still trying to get my hubster to watch all the series!
@MarianKeyes @vinnymacnamara Gäädek jäämit 😱😱
@martin_compston Those who voted for Broadchurch probably never watched Line Of Duty @Line_of_duty (like my hubster!)... I would vote for LOD EVERY time! Enjoy the rest of the night, all of you!!
Yaaaaay!!!! @thismorning for Daytime!! Congrats @Schofe and @hollywills #NTA
Love Broadchurch but I love #LineOfDuty more!! @Line_of_duty should've won! @martin_compston @Vicky_McClure #NTA
@MarianKeyes Thank you, Marian. You're a star #StarsForCarmel
In memory of @caramelamac ... for anyone who would like to make a donation or help in fundraising for @MYMY_NI #StarsForCarmel #MissingMySisterInLaw #MentalHealthWellBeing

@MarianKeyes In memory of @caramelamac could you please help to RT this for anyone who would like to make a donation or help in fundraising? Thank you. @vinnymacnamara #StarsForCarmel https://t.co/rx6W5669QL
@MarianKeyes @caramelamac @vinnymacnamara I'll DM you, Marian xxx
@MarianKeyes @caramelamac @vinnymacnamara Yes. Carmel. Is the letter there? I posted it on Friday. She was only 41, Marian
@MarianKeyes @caramelamac @vinnymacnamara No. But Vinny lost his baby sister on 12 Jan., Marian. We're still grieving. I sent you a letter. Snail mail.

It's hard to think that she is no longer with us, but the memories & understanding will always remain. Carmel and I loved Marian Keyes. The chats over Twitter & IG are. Now I don't see the likes, the retweets, the replies. We miss you xx @caramelamac @vinnymacnamara @MarianKeyes https://t.co/kGTUgyoWj8

...The pain is still raw. Our hearts are still heavy. People say to let go of someone takes love. Our love for you will never die, but we have to say goodbye...
@caramelamac @vinnymacnamara @MarianKeyes https://t.co/BKa8hyawEv

You were the only one who knew You knew what I went through, as you were going through it yourself. We exchanged notes, we compared our experiences. We had a common bond. And now, over a week has passed We'll need time to move on... @caramelamac @vinnymacnamara @MarianKeyes https://t.co/YZYaw0zPOy
@RYANMCS Two 10's!!!!! 9, 10, 10!! Woo hoooo!! #DWTSIrl
@RYANMCS What a gorgeous and elegant waltz with @GregorErin.... And you had Julian in tears! #DWTSIrl
@comfycardigan @SixNationsRugby @irnbru I did that the last time, so it looks like I'll have to compromise again to maintain harmony in the house lol!! 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁳󠁣󠁴󠁿🇮🇪
@lidl_ireland We're at Hunters, so we trekked like the others in the snow... All for your gorgeous bread! Got some cheese and onion rolls and multigrain ones too. Thanks again!!
@comfycardigan @SixNationsRugby @irnbru Irn-bru, Tunnocks and Mackies!!! I'm so screwed! Lol!
@SixNationsRugby I've loved Scotland for over 40 years. I'm living in Dublin, married to an Irishman for 11 years... So I'm torn. Ist half Scotland, 2nd half Ireland???

@lidl_ireland Thank you to the Lidl team, especially the staff at the Ballycullen store today. Just know that you're all appreciated, and we understand the constraints you're facing. Grateful to your bakers!! Freshly baked bread! Bliss. Thanks again! https://t.co/BDYbeoJmVw

@caitrionambalfe @IrishRugby I'm so torn as I support both! 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁳󠁣󠁴󠁿🇮🇪Hooowever, seeing as I've lived in Dublin for almost 11 years, I have to go #COYBIG and #ShoulderToShoulder 🏉🇮🇪☘️☘️☘️☘️ (I still love you, Scotland 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁳󠁣󠁴󠁿 and @SamHeughan
